George Washington.summary: George Washington was the 1st President of the United States of America. He died in 1799 at the age of 67, and his face lived on in his portraits.

Benjamin Franklin.summary: Benjamin Franklin was an important figure of the Revolutionary Period. He died in 1790 at the age of 84, and his face lived on in his portraits.

Thomas Jefferson.summary: Thomas Jefferson was the 3rd President of the United States of America. He did not die within the Revolutionary Period.

John Adams.summary: John Adams was the 2nd President of the United States of America. He did not die within the Revolutionary Period.
